featured.text: By 1975 the red imported fire ant had colonized over 52 million hectares of the United States.
Now, it has infested more than 275 million hectares in the country.

definition.zh_def: 公頃，一種面積單位，等於10,000平方米或2.471英畝。
definition.en_def: A hectare is a unit of area equal to 10,000 square meters or 2.471 acres.
definition.example: The farm covers an area of 50 hectares.
